name: YOU are the NPC
description:
How to Play

Controls: 

  • WASD - Move
  • Left mouse - Attack
  • Right mouse - Switch weapon
  • Right mouse + LCTRL - rotate camera
  • Middle mouse - rotate camera
  • E - Interact with glowing floor
  • I - Inventory
  • Esc / P - Pause
